sentences.en: A paint finish can transform something everyday and mundane into something more elaborate.
sentences.cn: 油漆罩面能够使普通而平凡的东西看上去更加精致。

sentences.en: Company finance is to provide funds for the everyday operation of the business.
sentences.cn: 公司融资是要为日常运作提供资金。

sentences.en: Describe it in ordinary everyday language.
sentences.cn: 用一般的日常语言把它描述一下。

sentences.en: everyday objects such as cups and saucers
sentences.cn: 诸如杯碟之类的日用品

sentences.en: I told you expressly to report to me everyday.
sentences.cn: 我明确告诉过你每天要向我汇报.

sentences.en: In everyday life you may sometimes have a brush with other people.
sentences.cn: 在日常生活中,你有时会与别人有点小摩擦.

sentences.en: It is a fact of everyday experience.
Many of the differences in everyday life remain.
sentences.cn: 日常生活中的许多差异仍然存在。

sentences.en: One in five young adults was struggling with everyday mathematics.
sentences.cn: 1/5的年轻人做日常的数学计算都费劲。

sentences.en: Prudent is wisdom in everyday life.
sentences.cn: 在日常生活中,谨慎就是智慧.

sentences.en: She longed for something to relieve the tedium of everyday life.
sentences.cn: 她渴望有什么事情能排解她日常生活中的烦闷。

sentences.en: She watches television to relieve the monotony of everyday life.
sentences.cn: 她天天靠看电视来解闷儿。

sentences.en: the synthesis of art with everyday life
sentences.cn: 艺术与日常生活的结合

sentences.en: They sought solace in religion from the harshness of their everyday lives.
sentences.cn: 他们日常生活很艰难,就在宗教中寻求安慰.

trans.tran_en: ordinary, usual, or happening every day
